test_module.name: sprint/us36550_snmp_hist_alrms/${WASS_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # Test Sanity CGCS app/test #######################################################
CALL env LOOKFOR TYPE \n SINK 1 SEC PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1SSH PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con1 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s) Con2 PROMPT (.*:~#\s)(.*:~\$)|(.*\]:\s)|(.*\)\]#\s)|(.*\]#\s)|(.*\)\]\$\s)
SET CR } SET CL {
Con1SSH TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC Con1SSH TYPE export TMOUT=0\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC Con1SSH SINK 3 SEC
Con1SSH TYPE cd\n Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC Con1SSH TYPE echo executing ${WASSP_TC_NAME}\n Con1SSH WAIT 100 SEC
Con1SSH FAILIF FAILED
Con1SSH system snmp-comm-add -c test_community Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC Con1SSH system snmp-comm-list -c test_community Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC Con1SSH system snmp-comm-show test_community Con1SSH WAIT 3 SEC
#CALL python3 ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/../utils/getFile.py -i $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat -u ${WRSUSER} -p ${WRSPASS} -s ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/mibs -d /usr/share/snmp/mibs/wrsAlarmMib.mib.txt -P 22
#CALL python3 ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/../utils/getFile.py -i $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat -u ${WRSUSER} -p ${WRSPASS} -s ${WASSP_TC_PATH}/mibs -d /usr/share/snmp/mibs/wrsEnterpriseMib.mib.txt -P 22
CALL test_snmp_historical_alarms.py $env.NODE.target.Boot.oamFloat FAILIF FAILED
Con1SSH WAIT 300 SEC
PASS
